name: ria pc game - pink dreams come true - robocop
name_original: ria pc game - pink dreams come true - robocop
description:
a combination of visual novels, quests and arcades

this is the story of a girl Ria, who forgot who she is,
you will find autumn depression, rain and a little romance
under a thunderstorm and the sound of rain.

And there will also be a robocop (this part has just begun)
